name: Pen Pals (itch)
description:
Pen Pals is a game about two people corresponding via letters. Use your pen to write the letter by following the blue dot. At some points in the game, you may find yourself wondering "what do I do now?" - but don't worry, we have provided a helpful assistant to guide you along your path. ^_^

[Credits]

Anthony Rossello (Brightstar)

Jamey Stevenson (dreamlogician)

Matt Tolman (HazMatt99)
